description: This Java source file defines the ActorController class, which provides REST API endpoints for CRUD operations related to Actor objects within a Spring Boot application. It handles listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting actors, leveraging annotations for request mappings and documentation, interacting with a repository layer, and managing exceptions.

classes.name: ActorController
classes.description: Controller class providing REST endpoints for managing Actor entities, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting actors.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all actors for a specified owner.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new actor, ensuring uniqueness by owner and name.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single actor by ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing actor's information.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove an actor by ID.
